name: Autober
description:
AUTOBER

Autober is a prototype made during the twitter challenge "devtober". It was made in a month with at least one feature everyday (except a few :p)

You're released with your trusty old car in a skeleton infested village. You need to reach the end of the race crossing every checkpoint while scoring as much point as you can. Take your time but not too much or you'll lose points.

There is only one map currently but the project is available on GitHub, feel free to make new ones and submit them to me.

Website: http://saarg.me/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/grimion_

GitHub: https://github.com/Saarg/AutoTober
